name: Faery Easterfestival
description:
After a long time drifting through the fall and winter regions, Tortellina and her underpaid servants finally arrive in an area where it's spring - and not just that: It's easter. Tortellina immediately decides to host a feast. Due to her long absence though, she is poorly prepaid, so she and her servants jump into a portal, hoping it will take them somwehre, where they can do their easter shopping. But time is running and the three fairies need to come to terms with some unusual creatures to make their festival happen!

It's a very short game (about 50 minutes) made within two weeks, so there is nothing revolutionary to expect  but it may at least give you an idea of what sort of games are to await from
